meta.title: Modern Web Applications - HBW Technology Solutions

hero.subtitle: Harness cutting-edge technologies like Next.js 14, React Server Components, WebAssembly, and AI integration to build lightning-fast, intelligent web applications that set new industry standards.

technologies.title: Cutting-Edge Technologies
technologies.subtitle: We leverage the most advanced web technologies to build applications that push the boundaries of what's possible in the browser.

nextjs.title: Next.js 14 & App Router
nextjs.description: Latest Next.js with App Router, React Server Components, and Turbopack for blazing-fast development and optimal performance.

rsc.title: React Server Components
rsc.description: Revolutionary architecture that renders components on the server, reducing bundle sizes and improving performance dramatically.

wasm.title: WebAssembly (WASM)
wasm.description: Near-native performance for computationally intensive tasks, enabling complex applications previously impossible in browsers.

ai.title: AI Integration & Vercel AI SDK
ai.description: Seamlessly integrate AI capabilities with streaming responses, function calling, and intelligent user interfaces powered by latest LLMs.

web_components.title: Web Components & Custom Elements
web_components.description: Framework-agnostic reusable components using native browser standards for maximum compatibility and performance.

pwa.title: Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
pwa.description: App-like experiences with offline functionality, push notifications, and installable interfaces that work across all devices.

apis.title: Modern Browser APIs
apis.subtitle: Leverage cutting-edge browser capabilities to create immersive and powerful web experiences

demo.title: Interactive Technology Demo
demo.subtitle: Experience the power of modern web technologies through our interactive demonstrations

cta.title: Ready to Build the Future?
cta.subtitle: Let's create cutting-edge web applications that leverage the latest technologies and set new standards for performance and user experience.
